creator: dsb@smart.net
text:
The documentation page for the SchemaValidate task 
(http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/schemavalidate.html)
is titled with the capitalization "SchemaValidate" and never mentions 
that it needs to be capitalized as "schemavalidate" in order to work.

(It could be that the code is supposed to take different capitalizations
but is broken and doesn't.)

Usually tasks a complete lower case.
There is no logic for loading tasks case-ignoring (that I'm aware of).
Also have a look at the examples, they should be runnable.

But I put a small note
git:016fa99430748de279f60f23ac10dba884811547
creator: jan@materne.de
